comments.author: gambleman
comments.body: I like that this is a connect-wallet kind of app, so I do not need to create an account to play. How long have you all been around? FREE Roll tournaments means I do no need to play with my deposit?

comments.author: HunnyFinance
comments.body: Quote from: gambleman on December 19, 2022, 08:05:47 AMI like that this is a connect-wallet kind of app, so I do not need to create an account to play. How long have you all been around? FREE Roll tournaments means I do no need to play with my deposit?Yes, you can just connect your existing wallets like TRUST OR METAMASK to start playing HunnyPoker. For now we don't need to have your details or KYC when you want to signup. So we can ensure you are anonymous while playing poker with your peers. We have been around since mid 2021, and HunnyPoker was one of the earlier projects by Hunny. Other than poker, we have our crypto casino HunnyPlay as well. For more details on HunnyPlay.com you can check out our official thread https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5422950 .One awesome thing about HunnyPoker now is we are giving out free prizes through daily FREE ROLL. And there is no need for anyone to deposit to get the prizes. FREE ROLL is now available only for the time being as we are getting more users, when we do have enough traction, we will consider taking this awayJust take note of the timing and register the games with "buy-in" as FREE.

comments.author: gambleman
comments.body: Quote from: HunnyFinance on December 19, 2022, 08:42:29 AMQuote from: gambleman on December 19, 2022, 08:05:47 AMI like that this is a connect-wallet kind of app, so I do not need to create an account to play. For more details on HunnyPlay.com you can check out our official thread https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5422950 .One awesome thing about HunnyPoker now is we are giving out free prizes through daily FREE ROLL. And there is no need for anyone to deposit to get the prizes. FREE ROLL is now available only for the time being as we are getting more users, when we do have enough traction, we will consider taking this awayJust take note of the timing and register the games with "buy-in" as FREE.https://i.imgur.com/umDDAC8.jpgFree $100 everyday is indeed a good promotion to gain market share. As you run your promotional campaigns, I would suggest to enable more coins in your APP for deposit, especially BTC and ETH, as these are the majority people in this community. How do I sign up for the Big Christmas promotion on the 25th Dec?

comments.author: CoinEraser
comments.body: Is the big christmas poker party also a freeroll? Or how much do you have to pay to take part? I think the idea of this poker party is great, but I just don't think I'll have time for it. Otherwise I would certainly play along.

comments.author: HunnyFinance
comments.body: Quote from: gambleman on December 19, 2022, 08:53:54 AM...Free $100 everyday is indeed a good promotion to gain market share. As you run your promotional campaigns, I would suggest to enable more coins in your APP for deposit, especially BTC and ETH, as these are the majority people in this community. How do I sign up for the Big Christmas promotion on the 25th Dec? Thank you for your suggestions on having more deposits. We will be enabling deposits in ETH BTC. It should be inline with HunnyPlay as well. Do stay tuned.You can sign up Big Christmas Poker Party Tournament via Hunnypoker.com. Refer to the image below. Register fast as we only have 1000 seats. The pool prize is $1650 and you don't need to deposit at all.Quote from: CoinEraser on December 21, 2022, 09:34:30 AMIs the big christmas poker party also a freeroll? Or how much do you have to pay to take part? I think the idea of this poker party is great, but I just don't think I'll have time for it. Otherwise I would certainly play along.¬† BIG CHRISTMAS POKER PARTY is free to join with $0 buy in. Come try your luck if you are free on Christmas day. If you are busy, you can also try our daily free roll, which is $0 deposit, $0 buy in.Here's how you register in Hunnypoker.com. Buy-in is FREE and you stand a chance to win up to $1650, many NFTs and other freebies

comments.author: gambleman
comments.body: I just registered in this Christmas HunnyPoker game on the 25th Dec. And I played a free roll with $0 buy in today. Lost the game but I still got $0.40 BUSD for free as participation rewards. I think first prize got around $5 BUSD. Seems legit as I see so many people playing and collecting free BUSD everyday. Can you tell me what are the potential prize to get if I take part and win in the Christmas poker game?

comments.author: CoinEraser
comments.body: I finally managed to play a few free rolls and I have to say I had a lot of fun. Even if I didn't win a free roll. But there was one thing I didn't like so much. When cards have been distributed, I have to click once to pick up the cards (you can see a small animation when doing this). Is there any way to turn that off? Somehow this animation and the extra click bothers me.

comments.author: HunnyFinance
comments.body: Quote from: CoinEraser on January 07, 2023, 10:58:00 AMI finally managed to play a few free rolls and I have to say I had a lot of fun. Even if I didn't win a free roll. But there was one thing I didn't like so much. When cards have been distributed, I have to click once to pick up the cards (you can see a small animation when doing this). Is there any way to turn that off? Somehow this animation and the extra click bothers me.¬† Yes you can turn off the "peek card" in the settings on the top left of the screen. Some of our players like to peek their cards when they are dealt, it makes the playing experience more realistic. This is a very interesting function that we spent quite a bit of time doing.

comments.author: CoinEraser
comments.body: Quote from: HunnyFinance on January 09, 2023, 09:28:44 AMYes you can turn off the "peek card" in the settings on the top left of the screen. Some of our players like to peek their cards when they are dealt, it makes the playing experience more realistic. This is a very interesting function that we spent quite a bit of time doing. Ah okay! I finally found the setting. Thank you for the note. Yes, certainly some people like this option, but I'm not one of them. So I'm glad I can turn them off.

comments.author: HunnyFinance
comments.body: Quote from: CoinEraser on January 11, 2023, 09:54:30 AMQuote from: HunnyFinance on January 09, 2023, 09:28:44 AMYes you can turn off the "peek card" in the settings on the top left of the screen. Some of our players like to peek their cards when they are dealt, it makes the playing experience more realistic. This is a very interesting function that we spent quite a bit of time doing. Ah okay! I finally found the setting. Thank you for the note. Yes, certainly some people like this option, but I'm not one of them. So I'm glad I can turn them off.¬† Some more options in the settings that might be useful to make your game faster, like reducing the frame rate to low, turning off alti-aliasing, and/or turning off the soundWe have freeroll everyday(no deposit needed, winnings in busd), and over 100 players are in each game fighting for free $20 BUsd. We will soon be increasing the budget and prizes to get more players in.Majority of our HunnyPoker players are in discord. https://discord.gg/hunnyplay. You can also join our Hunnypoker Telegram group https://t.me/HunnyPoker

comments.author: gambleman
comments.body: Quote from: HunnyFinance on January 12, 2023, 08:42:39 AMQuote from: CoinEraser on January 11, 2023, 09:54:30 AMQuote from: HunnyFinance on January 09, 2023, 09:28:44 AMYes you can turn off the "peek card" in the settings on the top left of the screen. I finally found the setting. Thank you for the note. Yes, certainly some people like this option, but I'm not one of them. So I'm glad I can turn them off.¬† https://i.imgur.com/ekrnK5u.jpgSome more options in the settings that might be useful to make your game faster, like reducing the frame rate to low, turning off alti-aliasing, and/or turning off the soundhttps://i.imgur.com/50Jt6Gv.jpgWe have freeroll everyday(no deposit needed, winnings in busd), and over 100 players are in each game fighting for free $20 BUsd. We will soon be increasing the budget and prizes to get more players in.Majority of our HunnyPoker players are in discord. https://discord.gg/hunnyplay. You can also join our Hunnypoker Telegram group https://t.me/HunnyPokerJust joined the discord and I must say its quite organised. I have a few feedback. Is there an better timing for the free-rolls to be played? It seems that the timing is either too early during work hours or too late in the night. There seems to be a few bots in free rolls playing with us, is there anyway to remove or restrict them?

comments.author: HunnyFinance
comments.body: Quote from: gambleman on January 16, 2023, 05:04:01 AM...Just joined the discord and I must say its quite organised. I have a few feedback. Is there an better timing for the free-rolls to be played? It seems that the timing is either too early during work hours or too late in the night. ...We are revising and combining the prizes soon. The timing of the free-roll will also be changed. We will update the community once its fixed.¬† ¬†Quote from: gambleman on January 16, 2023, 05:04:01 AM...There seems to be a few bots in free rolls playing with us, is there anyway to remove or restrict them?We have disabled same user with same IP address. That should deter some bots or user with multiple accounts.

comments.created_time: February 01, 2023, 02:17:46 AMLast edit: February 01, 2023, 03:36:19 AM by HunnyFinance
comments.body: ‚ô†Ô∏è‚ô•Ô∏è‚ô£Ô∏è‚ô¶Ô∏è HunnyPoker League ‚ô†Ô∏è‚ô•Ô∏è‚ô£Ô∏è‚ô¶Ô∏è Starting : 1st FebruaryEnds : 28th February‚ú® Players who participate in HunnyPoker buy-in tournaments will receive points, based on their placement. There will be around 11 tournaments daily, one every 2 hours, different buy-ins, different structures. The points system is based on the stakes we have at this moment : ‚ú® Low stakes : 1$ - 4.99$1st : 25 points2nd : 20p3rd : 15p4th: 10p5th : 5pParticipation : 1 point‚ú® High stakes : 5$ - 50$ ¬†- Double points1st : 50 points2nd : 40p3rd : 30p4th: 20p5th : 10pParticipation : 2 pointsü§ëLeaderboard prizes : 1st : 100$2nd : 60$3rd : 40$4th : 20$5th : 10$6th-10th : 3$ üì¢ ¬†The leaderboard will be updated every Sunday. üö® ¬†Freerolls don't count.üö® ¬†Players need to be on our discord and use the discord name on hunnypoker to be eligible for the leaderboard points and prizes. Join now and say HI : https://discord.gg/j9jTB3KVAN‚ÅâÔ∏è Keep in mind, that we are in the beginning, we are testing things/platform and so on. We might change the tournaments structures during the month ( but it's not going to a huge difference ) and we will announce it first. We are starting to organise a new collab tournament, and we will plan to do at least one monthly for now. That will include some cash prizes and nfts, WLs and so on. When we are ready we will announce it. ‚ô•Ô∏è ¬†GOOD LUCK everyone ‚ù§Ô∏è
